channel.title: Multisite on Vanilla Forums Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Multisite on Vanilla Forums Documentation

item.title: Multisite
item.description: This feature is only available on Vanilla Cloud Learn More... Multisite management Vanilla’s cloud solution offers a number of configuration settings for enterprise-grade deployments. Deployment Types Single Community This is a classic forum setup. It is the equivalent of 1 installation of forum software. It can have any number of categories (what other products call “topic areas” or “forums/subforums”) arranged in a hierarchy. Each Single Community needs a domain or subdomain assigned.

item.title: Multisite Sync
item.description: Hub Sync A number of settings can be synced between the hub and its nodes.
